subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Florida’s Reilly Smith, Aleksander Barkov and Aaron Ekblad had second-period goals, and Vincent Trocheck and Jonathan Huberdeau scored in the third to put the game away.
snippet: Florida’s Reilly Smith, Aleksander Barkov and Aaron Ekblad had second-period goals, and Vincent Trocheck and Jonathan Huberdeau scored in the third to put the game away.
